about_the_game:
ExoSoul is an adventure in the not-too-distant future where it's hard to separate man from machine. In a battle to regain your humanity, you, a consciousness that now lives in a virtual world, must use a robotic body to escape your captivity and discover the truth about yourself.

PRECISION SHOOTER

Weapons alone will not be enough. Use your skill to overcome challenges and destroy increasingly stronger enemies.

15+ UNIQUE WEAPONS

In each run, you'll find a diverse selection of unique weapons that offer a variety of gameplay experiences.

5 STAGES OF SYNCHRONY

Keep your mind and body in sync to get bonuses and increase your chances of survival.

DEATH IS NOT THE END

Your body may be destroyed, but your mind lives on and is driven by the will to know the truth. With each run, you'll have access to a new combination of upgrades and power-ups.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux/X11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Exosoul is an adrenaline-fueled top-down shooter that will test your skills and reflexes. Fight for your life against relentless enemies while trying to synchronize your body and soul. You have a powerful arsenal of weapons at your disposal, but you'll need to use them wisely if you want to survive.
